channel.title: Books on The Modern Jihad
channel.description: Recent content in Books on The Modern Jihad

item.title: Book Suggestions for June 12th 2018
item.description: I think what got me interested in the possibilities of bioweapons in the first place was reading the book Biohazard: The Chilling True Story of the Largest Covert Biological Weapons Program in the World–Told from the Inside by the Man Who Ran It by Ken Alibek. That lead me to study to other facilities such as Lab 257 by Michael C. Carroll. Then who could forget about outbreaks of dangerous viruses such as Ebola or Marburg?
